name: The Evil Castle
description:
Will you be able to escape from the evil castle?

A 2D Platform game. This is my first project with Unity. 

Comands: 

Move - A S D 

Jump - Space 

Run - Shift 

Sheathe/Unsheate sword - R 

Attack - P 

Pause - Esc 

Credits: Graphic by Emiliano Ardolino 

Music by BloodPixel on FreeSound.org 

Character by rvros on itch.io
